name: Mondstadt
description:
The ceaseless whisper of the breeze plays upon the strings, creating a lovely music.
The passionate talk of the wind and flowers is blown away, falling into the heart of the clear spring.
descriptionraw: The ceaseless whisper of the breeze plays upon the strings, creating a lovely music.\nThe passionate talk of the wind and flowers is blown away, falling into the heart of the clear spring.
